title: Tofu and vegetable stir fry
ingredients: ['8 dried shiitake mushrooms, soaked, stems removed and discarded', '1 teaspoon soy sauce', '1 teaspoon caster sugar', '1 teaspoon sesame oil', '1/2 tablespoon water', '3 tablespoons oyster sauce', '1 teaspoon sugar', '1 dessertspoon sesame oil', '250g firm tofu, sliced thickly', 'cornflour, as needed', '1 tablespoon oil', '1 tablespoon oil', '1 tablespoon finely chopped garlic', '1 medium onion, chopped', '1/2 teaspoon salt', '8 baby corn, diced', '200g assorted vegetables, diced', '6 dried scallops, soaked and finely chopped']
